##  QQnorm plot on gpu
```{r }
library('gpuR')
the21 = grep('OpenCL 2.1', listContexts()$platform)
if(length(the21))
	setContext(the21[1])
```



```{r eval=TRUE}
y <- rt(256, df = 5)
Nglobal = c(4,16)
gpuRandom::qqnorm(y, mu=0, sigma=1, workgroupSize = Nglobal )

x<-rnorm(256)
gpuRandom::qqnorm(x, mu=0, sigma=1, workgroupSize = Nglobal )
```
